Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-30204 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.25.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-30204 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.25.1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package azcopy is earlier than 10.25.1-5, affected by CVE-2025-30204
